title: Implement read operations in CloudCommsClient
description:
Implement the 6 read operations in comms/cloud.ts:

- fetchInfo() -> Return {repoName: projectId, epics: []} (epics computed from ticks)
- fetchTick(id) -> Return from cache with parseNotes() and computed blockerDetails
- fetchActivity(limit) -> Return [] (not supported in cloud mode yet)
- fetchRecord(tickId) -> Return null (not supported in cloud mode yet)
- fetchRunStatus(epicId) -> Derive from current run event state
- fetchContext(epicId) -> Return null (not supported in cloud mode yet)

Add tests to cloud.test.ts for these operations.
closed_reason: Implemented 6 read operations in CloudCommsClient with tick cache and run state tracking, 28 unit tests passing
